Posts.Content: I had a similar experience when I was about your age which lead me to be diagnosed with fibrocystic breast disease. My breast clinic was very aggressive - I had a large mass that didn't go away with my periods, the ultrasound showed nothing, needle biopsy produced nothing so he went ahead and did a biopsy. It was just a cyst. From what you describe it sounds like cysts. They generally occur in multiples, I know my do, can easily be moved and sometimes cause pain. My sometimes do, sometimes don't.
Posts.Title: Diagnosing a lump as benign w/o a biopsy?
